code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Products(){const[items,setItems]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('/product/items').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setItems(data);console.log('Fetched items:',data);}).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching items:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Example Webshop"}),items.map((item,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:item.product_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.product_description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.product_image,alt:item.product_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: ",item.product_price]})]},i))]});}export default Products;
